snippet: Major League Baseball added a second wild-card team in each league and established a new one-game, wild-card round.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Major League Baseball expands its playoff format to 10 teams, adding a second wild-card in each league; decision establishes a new one-game, wild-card round in each league between the teams with the best records who are not division winners, meaning a third-place team could win the World Series; other baseball items noted.
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball added a second wild-card team in each league and established a new one-game, wild-card round.

headline.print_headline: Roundup: Playoff Field Will Be 10 With Two Teams Added
